Python for Data Analysis

This document provides an overview of Python libraries for data scientists, including NumPy, SciPy, and Pandas. It covers topics such as data manipulation, plotting, descriptive statistics, and inferential statistics. The document also mentions visualization libraries like matplotlib and Seaborn.

Key Concepts:

  • Data manipulation
  • Data visualization
  • Statistical operations
  • Linear algebra
  • Numerical integration
